title: K&N Engine Air Filter: High Performance, Premium, Washable, Replacement Filter: Compatible with Select 1974-1993 NISSAN/MAZDA/OPEL/VAUXHALL Vehicle Models (See Description for select models), E-2830
features: ENGINEERED POWER: State-of-the-art filtration media provides up to 50% more airflow than disposable paper filters to increase power and acceleration. Clogged or dirty air filters can reduce your vehicle’s acceleration by up to 10%.
EASY INSTALLATION: Pre-oiled and ready to drop into your factory air box. One of the easiest and most cost-effective upgrades for your vehicle for quick performance gains.
SAVES MONEY: K&N high-flow replacement air filters will save you $250 over 10 years by avoiding disposable filters.
ECO-FRIENDLY: Using a washable, reusable product helps reduce replacement waste. A K&N filter will last longer than 10 disposable filters.
WORLD CLASS PROTECTION: Pushing the limits of engine protection by protecting your engine from harmful contaminants.
LOW-MAINTENANCE DESIGN: 50,000 miles before your first cleaning under normal highway driving conditions.
RACE TESTED: The Official Air Filter of NASCAR. Trusted on the racetrack—made for your vehicle.
description: K&N performance High-Flow Air Filters are engineered to improve engine performance by increasing airflow up to 50%. Unlike disposable paper filters which must be frequently replaced, K&N Air Filters are washable, reusable, and engineered to last for the life of your vehicle or outdoor power small engine. Engineered to fit easily into your factory air box, installation can be completed in a matter of minutes! K&N develops and tests each product on the world’s toughest race tracks, so we can bring the highest level of performance to your daily driving. Join the millions of customers who have saved money and improved vehicle performance by upgrading to K&N filtration. Fitment: 1989-1993 NISSAN Patrol; 1986-1990 NISSAN D21 Pickup; 1986-1990 NISSAN Pathfinder; 1987-1989 MAZDA 323 III; 1987-1989 NISSAN Terrano; 1977-1986 OPEL Rekord E; 1978-1986 VAUXHALL Carlton; 1977-1984 OPEL Manta B; 1977-1982 NISSAN 200B; 1977-1981 OPEL Ascona B; 1977-1979 NISSAN 200SX; 1978 NISSAN 510; 1978 NISSAN PL-510; 1975-1977 NISSAN PL-610; 1975-1976 NISSAN 610; 1974-1976 NISSAN 710; 1974-1976 NISSAN PL-710
